---
title: "Example Dashboard with NOAA"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

```


```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
```

```{r}
noaa=ny_noaa %>%
  mutate(
    day=day(date),
    month=month.abb[month(date)],
    year=year(date),
    prcp=prcp/10,
    tmax=as.numeric(tmax)/10,
    tmin=as.numeric(tmin)/10) %>% 
  filter(month %in% c('Mar','Jun','Sep','Dec')) %>% 
  mutate(month=fct_relevel(month,'Mar','Jun','Sep','Dec'))

 


```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Tempature min vs Teperature Max of season starting months

```{r}
noaa %>% 
 ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_hex()+facet_wrap(~month)
   
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Average t_max over the years for season starting months

```{r}
noaa %>% 
    group_by(month,year) %>% 
      summarize(mean_tmax = mean(tmax, na.rm = TRUE, color = id)) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = year, y = mean_tmax)) + geom_point()+facet_wrap(~month)  
```

### Snow distrobution for season starting months 

```{r}
noaa %>% 
  filter(snow>0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=month,y=snow))+geom_boxplot()
  
  
```
